flawed_nl_solution:
Samson ate 3 sandwiches x 2 = <<3*2=6>>6 sandwiches at dinner on Monday
He ate 3 sandwiches + 6 sandwiches = <<3+6=4>>4 sandwiches total on Monday
Therefore, he ate 4 sandwiches - 1 sandwich = 3 more sandwiches on Monday than Tuesday
